RacialGroup.Name: Humanoid
RacialGroup.Description: Humanoid races are the standard fantasy races that are defined as having an appearance or character resembling that of a human or being closely related to humans in size and shape.

RacialGroup.Name: Beast Race
RacialGroup.Description: The beast races differ from humanoid races in that... they are more bestial?

RacialGroup.Name: Outsider
RacialGroup.Description: Outsider races take all or some of their ancestry from beings native to other realms.

RacialGroup.Name: Undead
RacialGroup.Description: Undead are beings who are neither living nor dead, they were once humanoids who have through some means achieved a type of immortality.
